description.en:
1. Ai, Daro. 1
Yukihiro and Takase are salary-men working together in the same company and whom share a physical relationship. However, Takase's easy-going nature and loose relationships with women makes things complicated for Yukihiro. 

2. Ai, Daro. 2
Yukihiro is moved to a new section of the company - located 3 hours away from Takase. Can their newly formed relationship stand against this sudden separation?

3-4. My Eyes & Your Eyes
Kamihara has never felt feelings of 'like' or 'love' towards another before but doesn't like it when Nakahashi points it out. Nakahashi is also of a similar state of mind, so when he suddenly confesses Kamihara finds it hard to reply.

5. Only Angel Knows
Chiaki has always had a weakness for abandoned creatures, so when he see's a man getting beaten by a gang he intervenes and ends up taking the man home to treat his injuries.
